options.label: D

options.text: Participants who adopted high power poses felt more powerful and were more likely to gamble.

options.label: A

options.label: B

options.label: D

title: The Watergate scandal: United States vs. Nixon

options.label: C
options.text: A type of particle that is used to describe the behavior of subatomic particles.

options.label: D
options.text: A type of energy that is released by the sun.

options.label: C
options.text: C: The universe would be a different place.

options.label: B
options.text: A type of particle that is used to describe the behavior of subatomic particles.

options.label: C
options.text: A field that is used to describe the behavior of subatomic particles.

options.label: D
options.text: A type of energy that is released by the sun.

options.label: B

options.label: C

options.label: D

options.label: C

options.label: D

options.label: D
options.text: The energy released by the sun.

options.label: A

options.label: B
options.text: It gives mass to some particles.

options.label: C

options.label: D
options.text: It does not give mass to particles.

options.label: B
options.text: To see if the Higgs boson fits into other possible theoretical models.

options.label: C
options.text: To determine the properties of the Higgs field.

options.label: D
options.text: To understand the behavior of subatomic particles.
